excerpt: "AI technology from Audionamix to resolve audio challenges. LYNX Technik, a provider of modular signal processing interfaces, announced its new Instant Dialog Cleaner yellobrik module, which is designed to isolate speech and dialog by removing complex background noises in live broadcasts as well as recorded audio."
